duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide physical therapy treatment to patients, focusing on rehabilitation and pain management.
Create customized treatment plans for patients, addressing their specific needs and goals.
Conduct evaluations and assessments to monitor progress and adjust treatment as necessary.
Educate patients on proper techniques for exercises and stretches to aid in their recovery.
Collaborate with healthcare professionals to coordinate patient care and optimize treatment outcomes.
Maintain accurate patient records and documentation to track treatment progress and outcomes.

education_certification.credential: Doctor of Physical Therapy (DPT) degree - required
